A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I just waited until dvd\, maybe I'd give it 2 1/2 stars ... But really it was not an enjoyable experience to waste 2 & 1/2 hrs of my life watching nonsense. This movie bored me\, annoyed me & basically just felt pointless. It was a jumbled up mess. How can a movie this big not understand the basic fundamental elements of storytelling...it's baffling. . Oh & this movie really really likes to open doors... That just lead to nowhere & nothing. Like I said at the beginning- a lot of pointless nonsense.
